text: Vos divortium femina dodum they fulfill their interim (3 menstruations) vos allow them vivens in same domus amicably let them sinister amicably! Non force them stay contra their testimentum prout revenge Anyone perfecit hoc wrongs his suus anima. Non take deus revelations in vain Remember deus blessings vos He sent down vos scripture wisdom enlighten vos. Vos observe DEUS know ut DEUS est aware de totus things
